EmailTemplate.name: 09 – Repeat winners
EmailTemplate.subject: What’s new for Five Star award winners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Congratulations on your selection as one of the 2013 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s who will be included in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
We are excited that you have the opportunity to appear in the award section again this year. We have updated our research process to provide new opportunities for you, your clients and your colleagues to participate.
I want to answer any questions you have about how you were chosen for the award. If you have a few minutes to talk, please send me an email with a time that works best for you, or call me at your convenience.
I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2117 Cliff Drive Eagan, MN 55122 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
Award candidates and award winners: Please tell us about your experience with Five Star Professional. http://fivestar.98d1e644fe2e.sgizmo.com/s3/
